name: Grand Fairy Sidestory
description:
A simple First person dungeon crawler made in RPG maker MV.

Made in 3 days for the 10th Touhou fan game jam
Art, Programming, Writing: Me
Music and SFX are either RPG maker defaults or on Opengameart.org under the CC0 tag.
If you get lost, there is a map included with the download.

Feel free to comment any problems below.
